events.text: That's a quick goal! Veje is the scorer

ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡° Denmark are through if they win only if Belgium do not win OR if Belgium win by a margin of two goals or more OR if Belgium win 1-0 and Denmark win by a scoreline other than 1-0. If Belgium win 1-0 and Denmark win 2-0 would mean disciplinary points, eventually coefficients to decide who finishes first and second. Denmark are through with a draw if Belgium lose or draw. Denmark are out if they lose. - UEFA.com
ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡´ Norway must win by a three-goal margin and hope Belgium lose if they want to reach the quarter-finals. - UEFA.com
Denmark is officially in the playoffs! Norway unexpectedly finishes last
ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡´ They tried, but, unfortunately, at this Euro Norway team did not show their best. They're going home, but this tournament will definetely make them stronger.
ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡° Denmark fought hard, fought every minute of every match. They finished this group second, and now they're in the playoffs
